data.oai_dc:dc: Combined phylogenetic dataset for penguin phylogeny. 245 morphological characters, sequence data from RAG-1, cytochrome b, 12SrDNA, 16SrDNA and COI. 58 penguin species, 15 outgroup species. The original character list contained a numbering error, resulting in several characters in the 201-208 range being out of order. The new version of the character list has been corrected to indicate the proper numbering.
